projects.title: Buy-and-sell listing site

description.text: Angular: Creating and Hosting a Full-Stack Site by Shaun Wassell

description: . Website made purely for learning full stack development using Angular for front end, Hapi for backend, Firebase as authentication and Google Cloud to manage hosting and the SQL database. The website does not function as a real listing website for selling or buying items.

projects.title: Noah MacDonald (This website)
description: This website, created to host my projects and blog. Hosted on CloudFlare.
